title: Buying the wrong champion
body: Hi I bought heimerdinger by mistake and i don't have any refund tokens left is there nothing I can do?

replies.body: Aww, but Heimer is doing so well!  Just spam turrets and ZZ'rot.  :P  In all seriousness, it's a tough call if you're out of refund tokens so I'm not sure we can assist with this.  We do like to review each case individually, though, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's anything we can do.  We'll see you there!
